title: Specific phobia differs from generalized anxiety

content.question: Specific phobia differs from generalized anxiety disorder in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Specific phobia is linked to a particular stimulus, whereas generalized anxiety disorder is not.
Generalized anxiety disorder is linked to a particular stimulus, whereas specific phobia is not.
Specific phobia is not very upsetting for the sufferer, whereas generalized anxiety disorder is.
Generalized anxiety disorder is classified as one of the anxiety disorders, whereas specific phobia is not.

content.answer: Specific phobia is linked to a particular stimulus, whereas generalized anxiety disorder is not.

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
